name: MEC Cignal 50L Backpack - Men's
description:
Keep things simple on the trail. This no-nonsense backpack combines burly materials with a light aluminum frame for support. It's sized for a couple glorious nights off the grid - roomy enough for summer stargazing trips or hut-based excursions in winter. The clamshell zipper allows easy access to the main compartment, and the outside is peppered with pockets for frequently used items. Pole attachments, a raincover and RECCO® reflector make this pack an all-season player.Tough 450- and 200-denier polyester fabrics have a water-resistant PU coating.Light aluminum frame with mesh covered foam provides support and moisture management.Clamshell zipper gives easy access to the main compartment.Adjustable sternum strap takes tension off your shoulders.2 stretch mesh side pockets are sized to hold water bottles for easy access.1 stretch mesh front stash pocket is perfect for your emergency layer.Compression straps keep your pack volume small.Top zippered accessory pocket with internal security pocket and key clip.Tool loops and elastic bungee cords let you attach hiking poles.Padded hip belt is 3D moulded for comfort, with a zippered stash pocket.Recco® reflector is detectable by ski patrols and search and rescue teams.Hydration sleeve compatible.Rain cover included.

        Sustainability
